div.a: How Drones Are Invading Pop Culture

div.div: Both real and unreal, drones are spreading silently through art and culture.

div.a: Newtown Shooter Wanted To Top Norway Shooter

div.div: Law endforcement sources say Lanza saw himself as being in direct competition with Anders Breivik, a Norwegian man who killed 77 people in July 2011.

div.a: Russian Lawmaker Found Stuffed In A Barrel Of Cement

div.div: The body of a missing city legislator and construction tycoon has been found inside a rusted metal barrel filled with cement.

div.div: Ninety-nine percent of us live on the wrong side of a one-way mirror.

div.a: Meet The Meteorite Hunter

div.div: Michael Farmer talks about the art of finding—and selling—space rocks.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VpfE6J&via=Digg&text=Meet The Meteorite Hunter

div.div: THIS IS WHY THE INTERNET EXISTS

div.a: Finally, Food.com Teaches Us How To Make Ice Cubes

div.div: For most of us, making ice manually is an inconvenience thanks to built-in ice machines, but not a complicated task. Then there’s the rest of the world that requires a recipe.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XgJjQ1&via=Digg&text=Finally, Food.com Teaches Us How To Make Ice Cubes

div.a: Here Are Michael Jordan's Top 50 Plays

div.div: Yesterday, basketball legend Michael Jordan turned 50 years old. Highlighting his 50 greatest moments on the court only seems appropriate.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/12Z4F8p&via=Digg&text=Here Are Michael Jordan's Top 50 Plays

div.a: Photos From The World's First Underwater Nuclear Explosion

div.div: In 1946, the United States conducted a series of nuclear weapon tests at Bikini Atoll in what’s known as Operation Crossroads.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XksuAz&via=Digg&text=Photos From The World's First Underwater Nuclear Explosion

div.a: Do Gay People Really Make Up 3.5% Of The Population?

div.div: After years of wild guess and flawed estimations, Gallup has attempted to get some hard data on just how many gay, lesbian, and bisexual people there are in America. So how good are their are numbers?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/11QSZoR&via=Digg&text=Do Gay People Really Make Up 3.5% Of The Population?

div.a: Dogs Are Smarter Than We Think

div.div: Man's best friend can understand our point of view, new study says.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XXbB26&via=Digg&text=Dogs Are Smarter Than We Think

div.a: The Man Who Fell To Earth

div.div: Once a beloved world champion, Lance Armstrong is now a pariah in his hometown. Will he ever be a hero again? Was he one to begin with?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VZRu59&via=Digg&text=The Man Who Fell To Earth

div.a: Women In Singapore Are Tricking Men Into Stripping Over Webcams

div.div: The famous song Dooley Wilson sang in Casablanca may have got it wrong. For the age-old romantic story of "Boy meets girl" has surely become an awful lot more complicated now the internet has come along. At least, that's what male computer users in Singapore are discovering.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/11Qf8Uj&via=Digg&text=Women In Singapore Are Tricking Men Into Stripping Over Webcams

div.a: Crazy Guy Remasters 320x340 Doom Screenshot Into Stunning 9600×7211-Pixel Photoshop

div.div: This. Is. MADNESS. Watch Deviant Art user Elemental79 converting a 320 x 240 pixel screenshot from Doom—the legendary 1993 game that made first person shooters popular—into a stunning 9,600 x 7,211 image complete with textures, lighting and 3D effects using Photoshop. It's absolutely nuts.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UwUbJK&via=Digg&text=Crazy Guy Remasters 320x340 Doom Screenshot Into Stunning 9600×7211-Pixel Photoshop

div.a: Burger King's Twitter Account Just Got Hacked

div.div: According to Burger King's Twitter account, they've been bought by... McDonalds?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/151FTCZ&via=Digg&text=Burger King's Twitter Account Just Got Hacked

div.a: Why You Have To Inherit Your Father's Last Name, Not Your Mother's

div.div: It is not a good idea for daughters (or sons) to inherit their last names from their mothers.

div.a: How Traffic Jams Start

div.div: Smartphones have changed the way we drive, both by adding new distractions and by helping us get where we're going with GPS-assisted directions and real-time information on traffic jams.
